question:
WRITING TASK 1 You should spend about 20 minutes on this task. You are applying for a job and need a letter of reference from one of your teachers. Write a letter to your teacher. In your letter: 
Give details of the job & position you are applying for 
Explain why the reference is important 
Suggest what information your teacher could put in the reference 
Write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter to require your reference for an application job in a multi-national company.

Firstly, as you know , I have completed a post-graduate  MBA and applied for various job positions in an MNC association. One of the party has selected me as an Assistant Manager on a higher package. I am very interested to accept this offer and learning many more things from my senior manager. Here a lot of experienced teams are working which will help me to get more knowledge in the field.
Multi-nationals team always verifying with a university teacher reference and previous my job             experience. I have applied for a previous group experience

and need your reference to get this job. I will be a happy person if you provide me with your details in a letter. Thus, I am a very happy person in the world because of your teaching method and helping nature made us proud.
I need the details over a letter Name, employee id, mail id along with university stamp and your signature over the letter.
Looking forward to getting your positive Responses.

error_list.error_des: It seems that party may not agree in number with other words in this phrase.
